stories.Title: Case Study: LEGO
stories.Header: Watch an innovation case study on how lego has become the most innovative toy company in the world.

exercises.Title: Innovation Blender
exercises.Header: Start your meeting with the Innovation Blender!
exercises.Description:
Exercise Instructions

  1. Ask the group to think of a recent purchase they love or new gift they received that they love or just their favorite product they just cant wait to tell others about.
  2. Have the group divide up into pairs
  3. Give the pairs 5 minutes to:
    • Quickly introduce themselves to each other (if its a group of strangers)
    • Share their most recent purchase or favorite new product with each
    • Come up with a new product by combining their individual products together
  4. At the end of the 5 minutes have the pairs report out by:
    • Have one person introduce the other
    • Have them tell about the new product they creates together

Innovation lesson

Innovations (new ideas) come through combining 2 things that have never been combined before.
